about.title: Hi! My name is John Stripe
paragraphs: Hi! My name is John Stripe, and I'm a designer and developer.

I combine creative vision with technical skills to craft functional and aesthetically pleasing solutions. My experience allows me to work at the intersection of design and development, bringing ideas to life from concept to finished product.
My main areas of focus include:
User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) Design: I create intuitive and enjoyable digital products, paying close attention to every detail of the interaction.
Web Development: I specialize in building responsive and high-performance websites and applications using modern technologies.
I love seeing ideas transform into reality, and I'm always eager for new challenges that allow me to learn and grow.
